DataElement.preferredName: Performing Laboratory CLIA Certification Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions related to CLIA certification of the lab testing/providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Performing Laboratory Clinical Laboratory Improvement Act Certification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products._A laboratory providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research._A Federal law establishing quality standards for all laboratory testing to ensure the accuracy, reliability and timeliness of patient test results regardless of where the test was performed and also to determine if laboratories are achieving those standards._The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A laboratory providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research.

Concepts.definition: A laboratory providing analyses of samples collected in clinical care or research.

Property.preferredDefinition: A Federal law establishing quality standards for all laboratory testing to ensure the accuracy, reliability and timeliness of patient test results regardless of where the test was performed and also to determine if laboratories are achieving those standards.:The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.

Concepts.definition: A Federal law establishing quality standards for all laboratory testing to ensure the accuracy, reliability and timeliness of patient test results regardless of where the test was performed and also to determine if laboratories are achieving those standards.

The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/23/15: Approved and released-tt._10/21/15 edit to long name.tt_10/20/15 protocol 9878; edit to long name/tt.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was the testing and analysis
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the testing and analysis of samples performed by a CLIA certified lab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If EGFR-mutation was tested locally, was it at a CLIA certified lab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has PTEN loss of function mutation or PIK3CB gain of function mutation been identified by local CLIA certified next generation sequencing (NGS)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was BRCA mutation status confirmed in a CLIA-certified lab?

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/23/15: Approved and released-tt._10/21/15 edits to draft new DE/tt_10/20/15 protocol 9878; edit to long name/tt.
